NDEFReadingEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The NDEFReadingEvent interface of the Web NFC API represents events dispatched on new NFC readings obtained by .

NDEFReadingEventSerialNumber.summary: NOTE Experimental The serialNumber property of the interface returns the serial number of the device, which is used for anti-collision and identification, or an empty string if no serial number is available.
NDEFReadingEventSerialNumber.value: A string containing the device's serial number.

NDEFReadingEventMessage.summary: NOTE Experimental The message property of the interface returns an object containing the received message.

NDEFReadingEventNDEFReadingEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The NDEFReadingEvent() constructor creates a new object which represents events dispatched on new NFC readings obtained by .
